items.name: Amin Shahnazari
items.content: I was particularly impressed by Reza’s ability to handle even the toughest problems. I’ve had the pleasure of knowing Reza for 4 years, during which he led one of our Front-End teams at Kasra. His wide experience in modern technologies helps us in developing enterprise-level products. Any company would be lucky to have Reza as a Senior Engineer.

items.name: Mahdi Forghani
items.content: Energetic, good-natured, and committed! These three words describe Reza perfectly. As a co-worker, I enjoyed working with him immensely, and I am confident that any future employer will value his dedication and technical insight.

items.name: Rana Yavari
items.content: Reza is incredibly supportive and responsible. He demonstrates immense perseverance in solving complex challenges. His energetic and positive vibe significantly improves the team atmosphere. I genuinely enjoyed working alongside him.

items.name: Fatemeh Yousefi
items.content: There is no funnier colleague than Reza, but he is also one of the most dedicated professionals I’ve worked with. He is always willing to go the extra mile to help. His expertise as a developer is considerable. I highly recommend him.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.subtitle: Insights into my working style and technical philosophy.

items.question: Are you open to relocation or remote work?
items.answer: Yes. I am actively looking for opportunities in Europe and am fully open to relocation. I am also experienced in working effectively in remote/hybrid setups.

items.question: How do you handle performance optimization?
items.answer: I take a data-driven approach: using Lighthouse and performance profilers to identify bottlenecks, then applying techniques like code-splitting, memoization, and server-side rendering to improve metrics.

items.question: What is your approach to mentorship?
items.answer: I believe in 'leading by doing'. I support junior developers through pair programming, constructive code reviews, and knowledge-sharing sessions to help them level up their skills.
